name: GitflowBranchGate
description: Apply a set of branch commit rules to help prevent stale branches and rolling back changes.
author: Kerwin Carpede

inputs.name: repository
inputs.label: Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of the repository to analyze

inputs.name: masterBranch
inputs.label: Master Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the master branch

inputs.name: developBranch
inputs.label: Develop Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the develop branch

inputs.name: hotfixBranches
inputs.label: Hotfix Branches
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the pattern for hotfix branches

inputs.name: releaseBranches
inputs.label: Release Branches
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the pattern for release branches

inputs.name: featureBranches
inputs.label: Feature Branches
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the pattern for feature branches

inputs.name: hotfixBranchLimit
inputs.label: Hotfix branch limit (number of branches)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Limit the number of hotfix branches.

inputs.name: hotfixBranchDaysLimit
inputs.label: Hotfix branches must not be older than (days)

inputs.name: releaseBranchLimit
inputs.label: Release branch limit (number of branches)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Limit the number of release branches.

inputs.name: releaseBranchDaysLimit
inputs.label: Release branches must not be older than (days)

inputs.name: featureBranchLimit
inputs.label: Feature branch limit (number of branches)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Limit the number of feature branches.

inputs.name: featureBranchDaysLimit
inputs.label: Feature branches must not be older than (days)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Limit the number of feature branches.

inputs.name: hotfixMustNotBeBehindMaster
inputs.label: Hotfix branches must not be behind master
inputs.helpMarkDown: Turning this on will fail the build if any hotfix branches are behind the master branch.

inputs.name: releaseMustNotBeBehindMaster
inputs.label: Release branches must not be behind master
inputs.helpMarkDown: Turning this on will fail the build if any release branches are behind the master branch.

inputs.name: developMustNotBeBehindMaster
inputs.label: Develop branch must not be behind master
inputs.helpMarkDown: Turning this on will fail the build if the develop branch is behind the master branch.

inputs.name: featureBranchesMustNotBeBehindMaster
inputs.label: Feature branches must not be behind Master
inputs.helpMarkDown: Turning this on will fail the build if ANY feature branch is behind the master branch.

inputs.name: featureBranchesMustNotBeBehindDevelop
inputs.label: Feature branches must not be behind develop
inputs.helpMarkDown: Turning this on will fail the build if ANY feature branch is behind the develop branch.

inputs.name: CurrentFeatureMustNotBeBehindDevelop
inputs.label: Current Feature branch must not be behind develop
inputs.helpMarkDown: Turning this on will fail the build if the current feature branch being built is behind the develop branch.

inputs.name: mustNotHaveHotfixAndReleaseBranches
inputs.label: Must not have hotfix and release branches at the same time
inputs.helpMarkDown: Turning this on will fail the build if there are any hotfix and release branches created at the same time.

inputs.name: masterMustNotHavePendingPullRequests
inputs.label: Master must not have any active Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Turning this on will fail the build if there are any Pull Requests targeting the master branch.

inputs.name: hotfixBranchesMustNotHavePendingPullRequests
inputs.label: Hotfix branches must not have any active Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Turning this on will fail the build if there are any Pull Requests from hotfix branches (Source = hotfix/*).

inputs.name: releaseBranchesMustNotHavePendingPullRequests
inputs.label: Release branches must not have any active Pull Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Turning this on will fail the build if there are any Pull Requests from release branches (Source = release/*).

inputs.name: branchNamesMustMatchConventions
inputs.label: Branch names must match naming conventions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Turning this on will fail the build if there are branches with names that do not match the predefinied naming conventions.

inputs.name: authenticationType
inputs.label: Authentication
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the authentication type to use for communicating with API. Note: For OAuth Token, 'Allow scripts to access OAuth token' must be enabled in the build definition options. If 'Windows Authentication' is selected, this would be the account being used by the Build Agent.
